column2: After  returning  home,  Amila  decided  to  lodge  a  formal  complaint
Bribery  and  Corruption  and  did  so,  having  travelled  to  Colombo  in  the

column1: following  morning.  He  returned  home  after  his  statement  was  recorded

column2: and PW4 came to  see him in Ampara.  He was instructed to  meet up with
the appellants and also  to  introduce PW 4 to  them as  the uncle who owns
the two-wheel tractor in which the timber was transported.
